argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_prmz | |- ( Q e. Prime -> Q e. ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_coprm | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. ZZ ) -> ( -. P || Q <-> ( P gcd Q ) = 1 ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. Prime ) -> ( -. P || Q <-> ( P gcd Q ) = 1 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_prmuz2 | |- ( P e. Prime -> P e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_dvdsprm | |- ( ( P e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ Q e. Prime ) -> ( P || Q <-> P = Q ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. Prime ) -> ( P || Q <-> P = Q ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_necon3bbid | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. Prime ) -> ( -. P || Q <-> P =/= Q ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_bitr3d | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. Prime ) -> ( ( P gcd Q ) = 1 <-> P =/= Q ) ) |
